title: By the Queene. Whereas by diuerse and sundrie proclamations heeretofore published ... restraint was giuen and made, that no shippes, crayres, uessels, shipmasters, mariners or sea-faring men whatsoeuer, of this realme of England, or the Teritories of the same ...
author: England and Wales. Sovereign (1558-1603 : Elizabeth I)
publisher: By Richard Ivgge, printer vnto the Queenes Maiestie [i.e. B. Norton and J. Bill],
notes: Actual name of printer and suggested publication date from STC.
At foot of sheet: Cum priuilegio ad imprimendum solum.
Reproduction of the original in the Bodleian Library.
